Text:
ClaudiaZ, Thanks for all that you do. 

I was wondedring is you stil had any copies of your torrents from last year on Y&R and B&B. Hard Drive crashed and was hoping to rebuild my collection, Any Help you can provide would help and I would be willing to negotiate the details. Thanks again!

PS

Hi, dear puresoap,

Yeah, I still have both soaps, for this year 2010. I'm not quite sure about how to handle your problem...maybe sharing them all again? Let me know what can I do...
